Template Function snow_riming¶

  • Defined in File user_functions.h

Function Documentation¶

template<class float_t>
void snow_riming(float_t &qc_prime, float_t &Nc, float_t &qr_prime, float_t &Nr, float_t &qs_prime, float_t &Ns, float_t &dep_rate_snow, float_t &rime_rate_qc, float_t &rime_rate_nc, float_t &rime_rate_qr, float_t &rime_rate_nr, float_t &rime_rate_qs, float_t &T_prime, const double &dt, std::vector<float_t> &res, model_constants_t &cc)¶

Riming of snow with cloud droplets.

qc_prime Cloud water mixing ratio Nc Number of cloud droplets qr_prime Rain mixing ratio Nr Number of rain droplets qs_prime Snowflakes mixing ratio Ns Number of snowflakes dep_rate_snow Deposition rate of snow mass rime_rate_qc Riming rate for cloud mixing mass rime_rate_nc Riming rate for number of cloud droplets rime_rate_qr Riming rate for rain mixing mass rime_rate_nr Riming rate for number of rain droplets rime_rate_qs Riming rate for snow mixing mass T_prime Current temperature [K] dt Timestep size [s] res Vector to store the changes cc Model constants
